import React,{useContext,useEffect} from 'react'; import ProductContext from '../productcontextapi/productcontext' const Navbar = () => { const productcontext = useContext(ProductContext); const {getproducts,productstate} = productcontext; useEffect(()=>{ getproducts(); },[]) return (

); } export default Navbar;
